DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the influence of an ICU diary implemented during the ICU stay on the psychological well-being of patients and families after ICU discharge.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of an ICU Diary on the Well-being of Patients and Families. A Prospective Multicenter Mixed Study
DOC.detailed_description: Implementation of an ICU diary in a randomized design in 36 ICUs in France The ICU diary contains entries from staff and families or relatives Quantitative description of psychological well-being of the patients and families or relatives are evaluated 3 months after ICU discharge Qualitative evaluation of how the patient uses the diary is scheduled by a phone interview 6 months after ICU discharge.
DOC.criteria: Patients with his family admitted in an ICU and mechanically ventilated more than 48 hours Patients without families admitted in an ICU and mechanically ventilated more than 48 hours Patients or families not fluent in French Patients moribund Patients with a neurologic or psychiatric disease responsible for admission or preexisting before the ICU admission Patients admitted after a cardiac arrest Deaf and mute patients
